title: Understanding Practical Domain
text: The practical domain refers to the skills and abilities that allow an individual to manage daily life tasks independently. Think about what areas of life require practical skills.

title: Key Areas of Practical Domain
text: Consider areas such as personal care, job roles, school tasks, and money management. These are essential for independent living.

hintAnswer: the individual’s ability to act independently in their personal care, job role, school and work tasks, and money management
title: Identifying Practical Skills
text: Which of the following is a part of the practical domain?
choices: the individual’s ability to make friends and have relationships with others
the individual’s ability to act independently in their personal care, job role, school and work tasks, and money management
a genetic disorder that involves the Fragile X Messenger Ribonucleoprotein $$1$$ (FMR1) gene responsible for producing a protein that helps brain development
when a fetus is exposed to alcohol during the prenatal period
